title: Chipmaker Nvidia's earnings ease concerns
description: U.S. futures fell while global shares were mixed on Thursday after strong-than-expected earnings from chipmaker Nvidia helped ease some investor worries over the artificial intelligence boom.
content:
HONG KONG — U.S. futures fell while global shares were mixed on Thursday after strong-than-expected earnings from chipmaker Nvidia helped ease some investor worries over the artificial intelligence boom.

title: Lowe's CEO Says Mylow AI Assistant Is Fixing Major Headaches
description: Lowe's CEO Marvin Ellison is all in on artificial intelligence, with the home improvement retailer using tech at nearly every level of its operation.
content:
At a time when many workers are worried about AI-related job losses, Lowe's CEO Marvin Ellison says the technology is helping his employees work better.

title: Samsung plans to take AI to entry-price smartphones, expand portfolio of Galaxy A series in India
description: Samsung is extending advanced Artificial Intelligence capabilities to its budget-friendly smartphones, aiming to broaden the AI phone segment. The brand is ramping up investments in retail infrastructure, with a strong focus on smaller cities and emerging markets. By keeping prices accessible, Samsung plans to make AI-driven devices mainstream and foresees AI phones overtaking traditional smartphones as the new standard.
content:

title: Norway Wealth Fund Says AI Is Catching Risks That Others Miss
description: Norway’s sovereign wealth fund said that since it started using artificial intelligence to help manage its portfolio, it’s been impressed by the technology’s ability to catch risks overlooked by both the media and external vendors.
content:
